definitions: (of a vehicle) capable of traveling without input from a human operator, by means of computer systems working in conjunction with on-board sensors

examples.text: the chief executive showed off by riding into an exhibit hall in the back seat of a driverless car

shortDefinitions: (of vehicle) capable of travelling without input from human operator

examples.text: the driverless train began to roll, rapidly picking up speed as it lumbered past six stations
